暳字的基本解释

暳
huì
古同“嘒”，（星光）明亮。
小星。

暳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huì］
［《廣韻》呼惠切，去霽，曉。］
(1)小星。《广韵·去霽》：“暳，小星。《詩》亦作暳。”一说小星微闪貌。
(2)众星貌。

暳字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　暳； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页499第28
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?呼惠切，音嘒。【玉篇】衆星貌。【類篇】小星謂之暳。或不省，作㬩。○按《詩·召南》今本作嘒。《正韻牋》云嘒同暳。

暳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
暳字的起名意思

小星。

Long
Basic explanation of words
Long
huì
Gu Tong "boom", (starlight) bright.
small star.
Long
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huì］
["Guangyun" Hu Huiqie, go to Ji, Xiao. ]
(1) Xiaoxing. "Guangyun·Qu Ji": "Yi, Xiaoxing. "Poetry" is also made of Xiaoxing. One talk about Xiaoxing's slightly flashing appearance.
(2) The appearance of the stars.
Long
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Character Department] 　暳; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 499 28
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Hu Huiqie, sound Boom. [Jade articles] The appearance of the stars. [Classes] Xiaoxing said it was so sad. Or unaware, make 㬩. ○According to the current version of "Poetry Zhaonan". "Zheng Yun Jian" Yun 嘒 is the same.
